response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations or personal needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it would be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to acquire the product for $9,500. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a fair deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 9500}
